title: Dreadnova Gangplank Skin Bug [GAMEPLAY]
body: So i realized this a while ago that everytime i use my Q on a minion or Barrel the Q animation (in this case the red bullet) flies towards the target hits it and then is kind of stuck in the middle of the air where it hit the minion/barrel. It happened in all of my recent games where i used the skin and it is kinda confusing seeing it everytime. I hope I made it as clear as possible as to what the problem is.

replies.body:
Hey again! 

Would you be able to provide me with your graphics settings? We're not able to repro this at the moment. D:
It's been happening in LCS games too. Not sure which ones though, i just remember it happening
Hah, I can't repro it because it looks like it's fixed. ;_; If you're still seeing it next patch, lemme know! :)
Hi hi! Thanks for the report! I saw a similar post, but wanted to comment on here, too for visibility. I'm following up with the team today! :D

This, apparently, isn't unique to the Dreadnova skin.
It also happens on the Special Forces skin. Not sure if it happens with any other skins aswell, but felt like I should let you know ^^
Hrm, interesting! Thanks for the heads up, it's appreciated! <3
Any chance the Q-sound will get a bit more ''umph'' in the future? It currently sounds like Star Guardian Jinx's auto-attack...

As well as Kog'Maw autos.
Noticed it in the Sonoran Kog'Maw skin.
Press W, have the visuals stick in place until reset.
